title: Sum of Our Parts
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 58% Cotton, 42% Polyester

description: The DeviantArt logo is symbolic of our mission. It's an audacious and inspired evolution of our original DeviantArt logo - literally turning the art world upside down. We love it because, like DeviantArt, people might not get it right away.
